type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Max Health

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/max_health).

Applies a check towards the max health attribute value of an entity.

Type ID: `apugli:max_health`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Max Health

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/max_health).

Applies a check towards the max health attribute value of an entity.

Type ID: `apugli:max_health`



---

comparison.description: How the max health of the entity should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the max health of the entity should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the value to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the value to.
